page.title: 16BUSINESS IN EARLS COLNE
page.content: My Dad's business is making foods,the company is called MULBERRY FARM FOODS. When we have made the food we sell it to Wine Bars,Restaurants and Wholesalers but not individuals.Some of the foods are {Beef Bourguignonne, {Chicken Blanquette,Beef Curry,Prawn {Curry,Chicken Curry,Barbecue Spare {Ribs and one vegetarians dish called {Jamaican Bean Pot.}The business started in 1981 and my Dad has got one person working for him called Tracey.We deliver to quite a few places some of them are The Dolphin, The Mitre,Scarfs,Abbey Freeze and The Match Room in Cambridge,the restaurant Steve Davis and Tony Meo own.Our biggest customer is The Dolphin. Duncan Collyer
